name: Space Jellies
description:
Space Jellies is a retro-inspired shoot-em-up.

Controls:
WASD or arrow keys to move,
Space to fire,
Q to toggle bullet time,
E to activate shield.

Activate the shield right before an enemy bullet hits you to send the bullet back at them!
Successfully counter 3 bullets quickly, and you'll activate an extremely powerful attack!
A new life is received every 5000 points, for a maximum of 4 lives.

If you find any bugs or other problems, please leave a comment and let me know!
